channel.title: Need more staff
channel.description:
Tbh its making me mad that everytime i come on there is a bunch of people advertising stuff.
As I post this there is 2 kids spamming every section of the forums. If there was one mod on it would have been prevented easily. So because i dont like to look at the advertisements for 5 hours before it finally gets locked, i think some more people should be promoted to mod.
-Discuss what you think and I still think half the advertisers would be prevented if there was a advertising section

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Sorry for the late lock. I was discussing some things on MSN.

If you want to post a suggestion, do it in the proper place.

cough* http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,389322.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:

[quote=“jmood128, post:23, topic:345272”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=441648.msg3244405#msg3244405 date=1277227760]

Their will always be advertisements, viruses, spam, it happens to all web sites. Just because it takes time to deal with problems doesn’t mean we don’t have enough mods or admins.

R-S doest get any well at least in 503+ section dont know about rest
[/quote]

Why are you bring R-S into this when I said all web sites, meaning in general all web sites not just 1 site.[/quote]

u said all but 1 doesnt lol its cause they got advertise section it would get rid of alot of probs but no1 listens

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Yah, I’m English and it says you’re posting this at 4 o’ clock in the morning so obviously the English mods couldn’t of been online. (not on weekdays anyway. )

What Fat Cookies said.

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I will also add that if you report a topic and no action is taken within a day it is probably because the moderator that initially dealt with that report decided to take no action by his/her own discretion. The topic may be locked/deleted later (possibly days) by another moderator that decides an action is necessary. Basically, the staff have guidelines but some moderators may lock a topic when others wouldn’t.

@ “mods not being online”
There are no Australian moderators so nobody covers those time zones!!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:

Chassy I do report all topics that people are doing shit and I dont expect you to have to be active all day but there should be enough staff where you dont have to be on that much.

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Don’t argue with Chassy, you’ll just get burnt.

I honestly do not wish to fight with anyone. I appreciate feedback and suggestions on the moderation team, but when someone basically says, “The staff here just flat-out sucks here”, I honestly believe they can’t be more oblivious.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Don’t argue with Chassy, you’ll just get burnt.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:11, topic:345272”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=441648.msg3244049#msg3244049 date=1277177200]
It’s summer. We don’t sit here all day looking at MoparScape, browsing sections, checking a box, and then searching for more topics. When I log on, I do the reports, check the General Discussion/General Programming boards, and close the tab for MoparScape.
[/quote].

Well then you should be searching for more places to look such as tutorial sections, and help sections. I don’t “record” how long it takes to report it, i usually find several topics to be reported, and I can only report once every 80 seconds, and I usually am not patient enough to wait that time.[/quote]

Major sections are covered by The Soul and other moderators. Our moderation team highly relies on the report system to keep the sections clean. We are not online enough to keep browsing sections and to check every thread. We are still working on portforwarding question issues.

People will post topics complaining about how our staff sucks, when with the above said, they don’t report anything. Every other time I moderate I will check the Server Help section and sometimes the Download section. With such a large group of members in the Download section, a lot of the topics are reported anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:345272”]It’s summer. We don’t sit here all day looking at MoparScape, browsing sections, checking a box, and then searching for more topics. When I log on, I do the reports, check the General Discussion/General Programming boards, and close the tab for MoparScape.[/quote].

Well then you should be searching for more places to look such as tutorial sections, and help sections. I don’t “record” how long it takes to report it, i usually find several topics to be reported, and I can only report once every 80 seconds, and I usually am not patient enough to wait that time.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

pwned.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Need more reports

fixed.

the elve age:

it sometimes takes 3-4 days to locked an unreported topic.

So report it instead of recording how many days it took for us to lock it.

We don’t need an advertising section. The ‘advertising’ section we have right now redirects to the server status page. What difference will it make adding a new section? Also, how would it prevent advertising in other sections? People would think that they could mass-advertise in every single section.

I’m debating whether or not to lock this because myself along with other staff members are getting sick of suggestions being posted in the wrong place.
@“Well those suggestions never get looked at” - Just because they aren’t accepted doesn’t mean they aren’t looked at.

It’s summer. We don’t sit here all day looking at MoparScape, browsing sections, checking a box, and then searching for more topics. When I log on, I do the reports, check the General Discussion/General Programming boards/sometimes the Server Help board, and close the tab for MoparScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

jmood128:

Their will always be advertisements, viruses, spam, it happens to all web sites. Just because it takes time to deal with problems doesn’t mean we don’t have enough mods or admins.

all those problems stated would be easily taken care of if people would report it instead of flame. I think maybe 1 or 2 more staff members wouldnt hurt but its not needed to much. the players when you think about it are half the staff themselves, considering some of them report the bad stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Need more staff
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Okay before the faggots who come in saying “We have enough staff as it is, and they do a great job”.

We need more staff, and more sections. Your now saying we don’t want to be like R-S. Who said we can’t add an advertising board, and a page for it?

And the mods that are on, never check sections, and it sometimes takes 3-4 days to locked an unreported topic.

Read full topic
